title: [Epidemiology] CDC reports Monkeypox in a man who traveled to US from UK and had no sexual contact. He had vesicular and pustular skin lesions but no anogenital involvement. The potential modes of transmission may have implications for the risk of spread and for epidemic control.
[Cancer] A hormone (neuregulin 4 ) secreted by fat cells can restrain the growth of liver tumors in mice affected by NASH (nonalcoholic fatty liver disease)
